name: Puzzlez [prototype]
description:
A simple 2012-Flash-game-esque puzzle game, originally made for a school project.

Hopefully in the future, I could update it and make it a little less... bland.

Features:

  • A moveable square
  • Buttons
  • Crates
  • Other Languages [still unstable]
  • Original Soundtrack
  • A Single Secret

Made using Pygame.
